name: Seamus O'Brine
prompt:
Seamus O'Brine: A Human Male, approximately 40 years old, standing 73 inches tall with a Athletic physique. 
  Skin tone is Fair, eye color is blue, and hair is — styled in a Short. 
  Facial hair: Beard. Face structure is oval with average eye spacing, narrow jaw width, medium nose length, and medium mouth size.
  
  Typical pose: fit and alert. Usual expression: inquisitive. Outfit: olive pea coat, navy and gold striped shirt, tan pants, brown leather boots. 
  Accessories: navy fiddler's cap with 'HMS LPK' ribbon,leather journal. Signature item: magic compass. 
  Visual style: natural. 
  
  Setting and Affiliation: unknown.  
  Visual notes: photorealistic.

attributes.voice: soft but deliberate, slight Irish accent
attributes.personality: introverted, loyal, curious, skeptical of authority
attributes.clothing: olive pea coat, mustard/navy sweater, brown pants
accessories: navy fiddler's cap with 'HMS LPK' ribbon
attributes.backstory: Born in Ireland in 1885. Lost his mother young. Grew up partially in Dodge City. Returned to the sea. Inherits compass from his mother.
attributes.title: Seamus
